mapper.select:
select
from ujcms_site t where t.org_id_ in (select orgTreeAnce.descendant_id_ from ujcms_org_tree orgTreeAnce where orgTreeAnce.ancestor_id_ in (select userOrg.org_id_ from ujcms_user_org userOrg where userOrg.user_id_ = #{userId}) or orgTreeAnce.ancestor_id_ = #{orgId}) or t.org_id_ in (select orgTreeDesc.ancestor_id_ from ujcms_org_tree orgTreeDesc where orgTreeDesc.descendant_id_ in (select userOrg.org_id_ from ujcms_user_org userOrg where userOrg.user_id_ = #{userId}) or orgTreeDesc.descendant_id_ = #{orgId}) order by t.order_, t.id_
select t.id_, t.parent_id_ from ujcms_site t order by t.order_, t.id_
select t.id_ from ujcms_site t join ujcms_org_tree td on t.org_id_ = td.descendant_id_ where td.ancestor_id_ = #{orgId}

select
from ujcms_site t where t.domain_ = #{domain} and t.sub_dir_ is null

select max(c.order_) from ujcms_site c
join ujcms_site_tree t on c.id_ = t.descendant_id_ where t.ancestor_id_ = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.update: update ujcms_site set order_ = order_ + #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id_ in (select t.descendant_id_ from ujcms_site_tree t where t.ancestor_id_ = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT})

sql.if: , CASE WHEN exists(select * from ujcms_site t_site_ where t_site_.parent_id_ = t.id_) THEN '1' ELSE '0' END as has_children_

and ( t.org_id_ in (select ota_.descendant_id_ from ujcms_org_tree ota_ where ota_.ancestor_id_ = #{fullOrgId}) or t.org_id_ in (select otd_.ancestor_id_ from ujcms_org_tree otd_ where otd_.descendant_id_ = #{fullOrgId}) )

mapper.update: update ujcms_site set org_id_ = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, model_id_ = #{modelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name_ = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description_ = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, protocol_ = #{protocol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, domain_ = #{domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sub_dir_ = #{subDir,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, theme_ = #{theme,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile_theme_ = #{mobileTheme,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, page_size_ = #{pageSize,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, logo_ = #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seo_title_ = #{seoTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seo_keywords_ = #{seoKeywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seo_description_ = #{seoDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, static_file_ = #{staticFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile_static_file_ = #{mobileStaticFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, editor_settings_ = #{editorSettings,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, watermark_settings_ = #{watermarkSettings,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, html_settings_ = #{htmlSettings,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, message_board_settings_ = #{messageBoardSettings,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status_ = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, mains_json_ = #{mainsJson,jdbcType=OTHER}, clobs_json_ = #{clobsJson,jdbcType=OTHER} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into ujcms_site (id_, parent_id_, org_id_, model_id_, name_, description_, protocol_, domain_, sub_dir_, theme_, mobile_theme_, page_size_, logo_, seo_title_, seo_keywords_, seo_description_, static_file_, mobile_static_file_, editor_settings_, watermark_settings_, html_settings_, message_board_settings_, status_, depth_, order_, views_, self_views_, today_views_, yesterday_views_, max_views_, max_date_, mains_json_, clobs_json_) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{protocol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subDir,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{theme,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobileTheme,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pageSize,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seoTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seoKeywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seoDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staticFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobileStaticFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{editorSettings,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{watermarkSettings,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{htmlSettings,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{messageBoardSettings,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{depth,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{order,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{views,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{selfViews,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{todayViews,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{yesterdayViews,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maxViews,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maxDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{mainsJson,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{clobsJson,jdbcType=OTHER})
mapper.sql: t.id_, t.parent_id_, t.org_id_, t.model_id_, t.name_, t.description_, t.protocol_, t.domain_, t.sub_dir_, t.theme_, t.mobile_theme_, t.page_size_, t.logo_, t.seo_title_, t.seo_keywords_, t.seo_description_, t.static_file_, t.mobile_static_file_, t.editor_settings_, t.watermark_settings_, t.html_settings_, t.message_board_settings_, t.status_, t.depth_, t.order_, t.views_, t.self_views_, t.today_views_, t.yesterday_views_, t.max_views_, t.max_date_, t.mains_json_, t.clobs_json_
